channel.title: CVE Feed for svs-websoft -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-2959|2024-05-02T16:52:14.997Z -- svs-websoft -- svs%20pricing%20tables
item.description: The SVS Pricing Tables plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.4. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the savePricingTable() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to create and edit pricing tables via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
